statements: DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 100 AND rating > 3
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND player_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM game_reviews WHERE game_id = 500 AND rating > 4 OR player_id = 2001;
DELETE FROM player_reviews WHERE review_id = 100 AND player_id = 50;
DELETE FROM player_reviews WHERE review_text = 'Great game!';
DELETE FROM player_reviews WHERE player_id = 10 AND review_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_ratings WHERE player_id = 202 AND game_id = 302
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 101 AND player_id = 201
DELETE FROM player_ratings WHERE game_id = 301 AND rating > 4
